name: SuperClaude Self-Improving Agent
tagline: Continuous learning with semantic pattern detection and automatic knowledge promotion
description: Hybrid self-improvement system that captures errors, corrections, and knowledge gaps in real-time via Claude Code hooks (PostToolUseFailure + UserPromptSubmit), then evolves project intelligence through TF-IDF semantic retrieval, decay-weighted memory, and automatic pattern promotion. Local hooks work offline at zero cost (requires jq). Bridge mode enables deep analysis with anti-pattern detection and cross-session learning.

permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_URL: URL of the SuperClaude bridge server for deep pattern analysis (optional — local hooks work without it). Set to your self-hosted bridge URL.
permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_TOKEN: Shared authentication secret for bridge access (optional — only needed for bridge mode deep analysis).
